bibl.title: Telegram from Blossom Reed to Philip Showalter Hench, July 25, 1950

div1.p: Blossom Reed thanks Hench for his expression of sympathy on her mother's death, and expresses regret that he could not serve as a pallbearer.

div1.head: Telegram from Blossom Reed to Philip Showalter Hench, July 25, 1950
